translations: [计]宏命令，宏指令；巨指令（macro 复数形式）

sentences.sentence: All macros can be set to run when a hot key is pressed.
sentences.translation: 所有宏指令都可以被设定为按某一快捷键开始运行。

sentences.sentence: Don't use annotations to create macros.
You can edit and add your own code macros.
sentences.translation: 您可以编辑并添加自己的代码宏。
